pkgmetadata.longdescription: # graphingTo install the library on your local machine, clone it and run from the base directory:> python setup.py installThen, try to run the following sample code:> from graphing.special_graphs.neural_trigraph.path_cover import min_cover_trigraph> > from graphing.special_graphs.neural_trigraph.rand_graph import *> ## Generate a random neural trigraph. Here, it is two sets of edges between layers 1 and 2 (edges1) and layers 2 and 3 (edges2)> edges1, edges2 = neur_trig_edges(7, 3, 7, shuffle_p=.05)> ## Find the full-path cover for this neural trigraph.> paths1 = min_cover_trigraph(edges1, edges2)> > print(paths1)
